name: Sky Monster Adventure: The Airport Plane Flight Under Radar - Free
name_original: Sky Monster Adventure: The Airport Plane Flight Under Radar - Free
description:
There is a huge party in monster land, but it's on a floating island far away !
No worries you have your own plane, the only problem is that there are those hungry birds attacking everything, you'll have to be careful, or you'll crash your plane and miss the fun.

Pick up as many gift as you can on your way to the party, you'll be able to track your score and even beat your high score ! On your way Energy Drinks will help you crush some birds along the way, each drink will get you invincible for a few seconds.

DOWNLOAD MONSTER ADVENTURE for FREE now !

We would love your comments ! Please send us your feedback.
